title: JSW warns of delay in first car launch over China parts licence, letter shows
desc: JSW Motors faces a potential delay in its first car launch. The company needs fast-tracked import licenses for essential parts from China. JSW is investing heavily in hybrid and electric vehicles in Maharashtra. The government's quality control rules are causing the hold-up. This could impact the planned second-half launch of their new car.

title: Without explanation, FAA closes El Paso and New Mexico airspace for 10 days, cites national defense
desc: The Federal Aviation Administration has closed airspace over El Paso and parts of southern New Mexico for 10 days under a national defense designation, offering no explanation for the rare move.An unexplained FAA order has shut down air space over El Paso and parts of southern New Mexico, warning that aircraft violating the restriction could face interception and possible use of deadly force.
